Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People are eagerly awaiting the upcoming Federal Budget with great anticipation. The people expect the government to address the issues concerning the jobseeker rate the spiraling costs of aged care and welfare assistance and the urgent need for increased support for young people. The GPs are also calling for changes to make healthcare more affordable while the LNP is requesting full funding for Rockhampton's Ring Road. Despite expectations some people appear skeptical of the Labor Party's plan to raise the rate by 20aw at most which they believe is not an adequate raise.
